title: The Paediatrics Association recognizes the link between the HIV vaccine and cancer.
subtitle: A misleading article claimed that an association of pediatricians had "introduced" a link between the human papilloma virus vaccine Gardasil and the ovarian "fail" or cancer.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: An association of pediatricians "acknowledged" that HPV Gardasil's vaccine causes "failure" or cancer.
